title: Ep 105: Big Baking Soda is behind Inflation! feat. GhostHoney
description:
In This Episode: We brought on a very special guest, Ghosthoney aka Tyler Gaca, to help us judge our longest story YET! We have a "friend" who demands to be part of a new relationship, this boyfriend swears Mr. Floppy-Ear's is trying to end his marriage, and a listener sends in some secret family tea from their grandma. And for this week's Circle Jerdge Christian gives us a peak into the baking soda conspiracy world.
__________________________________________________________________________________
Go listen to GhostHoney's Dream Machine:
https://www.podpeople.com/dream-machine 
And make sure to follow Tyler:
https://www.tiktok.com/@ghosthoney 
https://www.instagram.com/tylergaca 
__________________________________________________________________________________
Get Judgies Merch Here:
https://www.bonfire.com/store/the-judgies-podcast/

Our Patreon is officially open, if you want to see extra content go check it out! 
https://www.patreon.com/JudgiesPod 

Send us mail! (Addressed However You'd Like)
 P.O. Box 58 Ottawa, IL 61350 

Leave a Review! 
https://podcasts.apple.com/us/podcast/the-judgies/id1519741238 

Follow us on Twitter: https://twitter.com/judgiespod
Follow us on Instagram: https://instagram.com/judgiespod 

Intro Music by: Iván 
https://open.spotify.com/artist/5gB2VvyqfnOlNv37PHKRNJ?si=f6TIYrLITkG2NZXGLm_Y-Q&dl_branch=1

4:33 The Two Pillars of the relationship
